specs.title: Normal (ISOM 2017-2)
specs.intro: The ISOM 2017-2 map symbols are used for normal orienteering maps, generally at 1:10,000 or 1:15,000.

specs.title: Schools (BOF)
specs.intro: The BOF school map symbols are used for school orienteering maps in Great Britain.

specs.title: Sprint (ISSprOM 2019-2)
specs.intro: The ISSprOM 2019-2 sprint map symbols are used for sprint orienteering maps at 1:4,000.
specs.alt: Maprunner ISSOM 2019-2 sprint map symbols guide
